Description
-----------
Provides access to GDI+ graphics functionality.

Commonly Used Types:
System.Drawing.Bitmap
System.Drawing.BitmapData
System.Drawing.Brush
System.Drawing.Font
System.Drawing.Graphics
System.Drawing.Icon
 
When using NuGet 3.x this package requires at least version 3.4.
